argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zrng.1 | |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( x e. ZZ -> x e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zaddcl | |- ( ( x e. ZZ /\ y e. ZZ ) -> ( x + y ) e. ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | #P_znegcl | |- ( x e. ZZ -> -u x e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_1z | |- 1 e. ZZ |
| 6 | 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_cnsubglem | |- ZZ e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` CCfld ) = ( .g ` CCfld ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` Z ) = ( .g ` Z ) |
| 9 | 7, 1, 8 | #P_subgmulg | |- ( ( ZZ e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( A ( .g ` CCfld ) B ) = ( A ( .g ` Z ) B ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_mp3an1 | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( A ( .g ` CCfld ) B ) = ( A ( .g ` Z ) B ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> B e. ZZ ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_zcnd | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 13 |  | #P_cnfldmulg | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A ( .g ` CCfld ) B ) = ( A x. B ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( A ( .g ` CCfld ) B ) = ( A x. B ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( A ( .g ` Z ) B ) = ( A x. B ) ) |
